author: remm
msg: - AbstractStore now extends AbstractSimpleService (it doesn't really matter,
since it's not meant to be enlisted).
- Failure to enlist is now considered a failure.

author: remm
msg: - AbstractSimpleService only accepts to be enlisted in a single transaction at
- AbstractService accepts to be part of multiple transactions.
- AbstractXAService is meant to be used when implementing a store based
of a XA compliant resource manager (in which case you just can forward it

author: remm
msg: - Global transaction id should be unique, IMO. To this end, it includes the
current time and the current transaction number. That way, it should also
provide reasonable uniqueness across server restarts.
